item.itunes:subtitle: What would your life would be like if you were fully communicated with everyone around you and they with you?
item.itunes:summary: Just imagine for a second what your life would be like if you were fully communicated with everyone around you and they with you. What would your life be like? What would work be like? How much more would you get accomplished? This program takes a look at all of these questions and more and takes you step by step through what it takes to be in full and complete communication everywhere!

item.title: Integrity
item.description: Being your word. Doing what you say you are going to do. Original airdate 11-October-2006.
item.itunes:author: Clay S. Nelson
item.itunes:subtitle: Being your word. Doing what you say you are going to do.
item.itunes:summary: Integrity. Being your word. Doing what you say you are going to do. It is the one thing in this world that doesn’t ever change. We either are our word or we aren’t. This program addresses integrity from its definition to how we put our integrity back in place when it is missing.

item.title: Dealing with Change
item.description: While we often resist change, our ability to grow is all about our being able to change. Original airdate 04-October-2006.
item.itunes:author: Clay S. Nelson
item.itunes:subtitle: While we often resist change, our ability to grow is all about our being able to change.
item.itunes:summary: The only real constant in the world is change. It is unavoidable! While we often resist change, our ability to grow is all about our being able to change. This program looks at why we resist change and why it is necessary to manage the changes that come before us, rather than attempting to hide from them. You’ll never really go anywhere… you’ll never really have what you want… you’ll never really live, if you hide from change. Why not learn how to deal with it in a powerful and effective way?

item.title: Asking for What You Want
item.description: Have you ever wondered why you don't have what you want? Original airdate 27-September-2006.
item.itunes:author: Clay S. Nelson
item.itunes:subtitle: Have you ever wondered why you don't have what you want?
item.itunes:summary: Have you ever wondered why you don't have what you want? Have you ever considered just asking for it? If you don't ask for what you want, there is no way people can give it to you; there is no way you can have it, simply because people cannot read your mind! This program takes a look at fear's role in stopping us from asking for what we want and how to ask for what we want and get it!

item.title: Accountability
item.description: How an accountability team will help you succeed. Original airdate 20-September-2006.
item.itunes:author: Clay S. Nelson
item.itunes:subtitle: How an accountability team will help you succeed.
item.itunes:summary: What specific areas do you struggle with in terms of accountability? How do you hold other people accountable? Where is accountability missing in your life? This program takes you through the definition of accountability; the role accountability has in helping us get past our stops, and how to build a team that you allow to hold you accountable for doing and being all that you say you are going to do and be!

item.title: Personal Planning
item.description: Clay discusses the power of a personal plan. Original airdate 13-September-2006.
item.itunes:author: Clay S. Nelson
item.itunes:subtitle: Discover the power of having a personal plan.
item.itunes:summary: Life is all about having fun, and unfortunately too many of us have forgotten how to smile, let alone have fun! This program is all about how to get back to taking care of you, to living a balanced life, and how a personal plan can help you do it. So do you want to get past believing there is a fun prison? Take a listen!

item.title: How to Let Fear Serve You
item.description: Get past your fears and turn them into something that moves you forward. Original airdate 6-September-2006.
item.itunes:author: Clay S. Nelson
item.itunes:subtitle: Get past your fears and turn them into something that moves you forward.
item.itunes:summary: What has you stopped... what are you dreading... what are you worried about and how is it keeping you from being who you are committed to be? This program is all about how to get past your fears and turn them into something that actually moves you forward rather than stops you.
